{"step_by_step_thinking": "The relevant documents discuss osteoblastic bone metastases secondary to adenocarcinoma of the pancreas. The incidence of bone metastases is unknown since radiological studies are rarely undertaken. However, the authors' experience suggests that osteoblastic bone metastases are commoner than generally recognised.
